# my-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute  | Description                          | Type                              | Default    |
| ------------ | ---------- | ------------------------------------ | --------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `border`     | `border`   | Set border button, default 'true'    | `boolean`                         | `true`     |
| `isDisabled` | `disabled` |                                      | `boolean`                         | `false`    |
| `role`       | `role`     | Set the role, respectively `button`  | `string`                          | `'button'` |
| `size`       | `size`     | Specifies the default size of button | `"LARGE" \| "MEDIUM" \| "SMALL"`  | `'MEDIUM'` |
| `type`       | `type`     | Specifies type of input              | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"` | `'button'` |


## Events

| Event     | Description                                                 | Type                   |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `clicked` | Emit event onClicked when has click or press ENTER or SPACE | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |
